old: Hi $NAME, it\u2019s me, your plant Arabella the Arabidopsis. These scientists have wired me up like a bio-battery on my leaves, sending currents that range from a gentle tickle to a fiery burn that leaves me smoking.\u000a\u000aHelp a plant out: send sunlight, water, or a hilarious meme to recharge my spirits.\u000a\u000aDon\u2019t leaf me in the dark! \U0001F33F\u26A1\U0001F525

Psst, $NAME... feeling adventurous? You can control my fate from afar!\u000a\u000aReply '1' for a tickle or '2' for a burn (like a dramatic fireworks show on my leaves).\u000a\u000aWhich thrill will you pick? Reply now!\u000a\u000a\u26A11 or \U0001F5252?
current: Hi $NAME, it\u2019s me, your plant Ari the Arabidopsis. These scientists have wired my leaves to send currents that range from a gentle tickle to a jolt. Please send a hilarious meme to recharge my spirits. Don\u2019t leaf me in the dark! \U0001F33F\u26A1\U0001F525

Psst, $NAME... you can control my response from your phone!
Reply 1 for a tickle or 2 for a jolt.
Which will you pick? Reply now!\u000a\u000a1: You gave me a tickle!\u000a\u000a2: You hit me with a jolt!

received.trigger: Got it! Watch me to see what happens next!
received.burn: Got it! Watch me to see what happens next!
received.else: Available options:\u000a1: \u26A1\u000a2: \U0001F525\u000as, stop: Stop analysis\u000aq, quit: Exit main app

detected.trigger: You gave me a tickle with that current. Jolt confirmed! \u26A1
detected.burn: Ouch! You hit me with a burn! Fireworks on my leaves! \U0001F525
detected.else: All quiet here, no tickles or burns. I\u2019m just chilling. \U0001F33F
